document_data.mainbody: '''skill domain''' was a [[deity]] [[domain]] that focused on expertise and proficiency.
document_data.Powers: Any divine caster who worshiped a deity of this domain would become better at skills they were trained in, and gained access to the ''[[righteous brand]]'' [[prayer]]. Clerics of the skill domain could inspire excellence among their allies, granting them more success with a skill for a short time.
